TopicTitle: Can't click on anything on the title screen.

Articles.Content: Opened KSP today and can't click anywhere. If I click on smth it just canges color to a darker tone and nothing happens. if I clear on the Debug menu nothing happens. Restarting and Reinstalling doesn't work either.
Has anything changed since it last worked like a driver updating or anti virus update etc? Which version of KSP are you on?

4 hours ago, FruitGoose said:

Has anything changed since it last worked like a driver updating or anti virus update etc? Which version of KSP are you on?

No, it worked just fine yesterday, maybe amd radeon software made an automatic driver update, but i already updated a few days ago. Im currently on the newest version i think. (playing on steam and haven't ever changed versions)

Edited May 1, 2021 by JoBlumi

2 hours ago, JoBlumi said:

No, it worked just fine yesterday, maybe amd radeon software made an automatic driver update, but i already updated a few days ago. Im currently on the newest version i think. (playing on steam and haven't ever changed versions)

Hmm not sure then. Only thing i can suggest is to “verify files” through steam but you said you reinstalled so probably won’t do anything but easy/quick enough to try. The only thing is I can think is when it freezes, go to the debug menu (alt-f12) and “clear input locks” which sometimes clears input bugs but I’m sure restarting the game would clear anything anyway so again not sure it’ll do anything.
